org.infinispan.cdi.interceptor
Class DefaultCacheResolver

java.lang.Object
  org.infinispan.cdi.interceptor.DefaultCacheResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
CacheResolver
public class DefaultCacheResolver
extends Object
implements CacheResolver

This is the default cache resolver implementation.

This resolver uses the algorithm defined by JSR-107. If the given cache name is not specified the default cache name used for resolution is the fully qualified name of the annotated method. If method is annotated with CacheRemoveAll or CacheRemoveEntry and the cache name is not specified a CacheException is thrown.

Author:
Kevin Pollet (C) 2011 SERLI
